column4: so. is there codefolding in gedit (not notepad++ or any other IDE, texteditor, editor and so forth, but gedit) :)
There are extras too in the repo.  Install that and see if it have what you're looking for.
I really love the various plugins for gedit. It is almost 100% textmate alike. And really speeds up my work a lot. Just the codefolding.... :(
